about_the_game:
This is another story of Kozue Nada, a popular character in 'HOT FIT!'
It contains many intense, sexy, and abnormal scenes with the main character of the original story.
There is also a part from Kozue's point of view, which adds depth to the story.

Kozue, who has become the temporary manager of a fitness gym, teases me as usual.
This escalates into a relationship where they have sex.
As I plays with her, I becomes immersed in intense, abnormal sex.
But I wonders if that's all I wants to do with her.

Different choices lead to different scenes and endings.
And from CONFIG, you can adjust the volume and change the clothes of the standing picture.
Enjoy the sensual play that takes place in the sports gym!

■Costume
14 patterns can be changed

■Change Language(Supports Language)
Japanese, English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
Window menu「System setting(S)」→「System(C)」→「Text tab」の「Language」
Chinese fonts are easy to see with Simsun easy to read.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game may contain content that is not intended for all ages, or may not be suitable for viewing at work: nudity or sexual content, content for adults on the whole,Heroine's agreement sex with the hero.
Mosaic is on the part of genital expression.

detailed_description:
This is another story of Kozue Nada, a popular character in 'HOT FIT!'
It contains many intense, sexy, and abnormal scenes with the main character of the original story.
There is also a part from Kozue's point of view, which adds depth to the story.

Kozue, who has become the temporary manager of a fitness gym, teases me as usual.
This escalates into a relationship where they have sex.
As I plays with her, I becomes immersed in intense, abnormal sex.
But I wonders if that's all I wants to do with her.

Different choices lead to different scenes and endings.
And from CONFIG, you can adjust the volume and change the clothes of the standing picture.
Enjoy the sensual play that takes place in the sports gym!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows8.1
  • Processor: 1.6GHz and above
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows8.1
  • Processor: 1.6GHz and above
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X Compatible
